MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG2 postcode area of Dumfries. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:39pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to complete repairs to faulty overhead line equipment between Wreaths and West Preston Cottage affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:51 PM on Tuesday, 13 October 2020.
